events.comment: Spawning enemies with the "Enemy Spawn" scene timer
Positioning the HealthBar_Enemy to follow the enemy it is linked with
Player collision mask deleting the EnemyBullet
Deleting bullets that have gone off screen, to improve performance
Reset the game scene if conditions are met
Creating darkening layer for pause screen
Showing the LevelUP layer when CurrenctEXP variable reaches MaxEXP
Increasing stat variables when LevelingButtons are clicked
